thread.section_title: Business & Financial News, U.S & International Breaking News | Reuters
thread.title: Fed Chairman Powell to testify on monetary policy report on Feb. 28: committee

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Fed Chairman Powell to testify on monetary policy report on Feb. 28: committee

organizations.name: house of representatives’ financial services committee

text:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell will testify on the central bank’s semiannual report on monetary policy and the economy on Feb. 28 before the House of Representatives’ Financial Services Committee, the panel announced on Tuesday.
The hearing with Powell, who took office on Monday, will be held at 10 a.m. (1500 GMT), the committee said.
Reporting by Tim Ahmann; Editing by Eric Beech
